sentences.en: ...a holiday cruising around the Caribbean.
sentences.cn: …环游加勒比海的度假航行。

sentences.en: 1,654 passengers were transferred at sea to a Norwegian cruise ship.
sentences.cn: 1,654名乘客在海上转搭了一艘挪威游轮。

sentences.en: A black and white police car cruised past.
sentences.cn: 一辆黑白相间的警车平稳驶过。

sentences.en: a luxury cruise liner
sentences.cn: 豪华邮轮

sentences.en: Before you blow it all on a luxury cruise, give a little thought to the future.
sentences.cn: 在把钱全砸到一趟海上豪华游之前，多少考虑一下日后怎么办。

sentences.en: Don's story unfolded as the cruise got under way.
sentences.cn: 随着航行的开始，唐的故事也随之展开。

sentences.en: He and his wife were planning to go on a world cruise.
sentences.cn: 他和妻子那时正计划进行一次环球海上航游。

sentences.en: He got a job as a singer on a cruise ship.
sentences.cn: 他在一艘大型游轮上找了个歌手的差事。

sentences.en: Holiday-makers can also add on a week in Majorca before or after the cruise.
sentences.cn: 度假者们可以在乘游轮游览之前或之后再在马略卡岛呆上一星期。

sentences.en: I made a hash o'this cruise, did I?
sentences.cn: 你们说我把这次航行搞得一团糟, 是不是?

sentences.en: I was thinking about a romantic cruise or scuba diving lessons.
sentences.cn: 我在想我们可以来趟浪漫的渡轮行,或是去上潜水课.

sentences.en: I'd love to go on a round-the-world cruise.
sentences.cn: 我很想乘船周游世界。

sentences.en: I've always wanted to go on a cruise.
sentences.cn: 我一直想坐游轮旅游。

sentences.en: Rough wea-ther would have denied us a landing on the island, for me the high spot of the entire cruise.
sentences.cn: 暴风雨天气差点使我们无法在岛上登陆，而上岛对我来说正是整个航游过程中最精彩的部分。

sentences.en: She wants to cruise the canals of France in a barge.
sentences.cn: 她想乘驳船游览法国的运河。

sentences.en: The next stop on this cruise is likely to be in Cornwall.
sentences.cn: 此次航游的下一站很可能是在康沃尔。

sentences.en: They went on a cruise to Tenerife.
sentences.cn: 他们乘船去特纳利夫岛.

sentences.en: We fly at a cruising speed of 500 mph.
sentences.cn: 我们以每小时500英里的巡航速度平稳飞行。

sentences.en: We were cruising along at 50 miles per hour.
sentences.cn: 我们以每小时50英里的速度平稳行驶。

sentences.en: What you need is a change of scene. Why not go on a cruise?
sentences.cn: 你需要换换环境。为什么不乘船去旅行呢？

在街上来回走动勾搭嫖客

trans.tran_en: A cruise is a holiday during which you travel on a ship or boat and visit a number of places

trans.tran_cn: 乘船游览，缓慢行进，轻取
trans.tran_en: If you cruise an ocean, river, or canal, you travel around it or along it on a cruise
If you cruise an ocean, river, or canal, you travel around it or along it on a cruise
If a car, ship, or aircraft cruises somewhere, it moves there at a steady comfortable speed
